ancientTemple.name: snakes
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Snakes! Jump over them by saying 'whee'!

ancientTemple.name: blow darts
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Blow darts incoming! Don't forget to shout 'yikes' to roll under them!
ancientTemple.headsUp: Keep your head down up ahead!

ancientTemple.name: floor spikes
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Floor spikes up ahead! Shout 'whee' to jump!
ancientTemple.headsUp: I see some sharp dangers coming up!

ancientTemple.name: arrows
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Arrows! Remember to duck under them by saying 'yikes'!

ancientTemple.name: swinging axe
ancientTemple.preObstacle: A swinging axe! Remember to say 'yikes' to duck!
ancientTemple.headsUp: Something sharp and heavy up ahead!

ancientTemple.name: collapsing floor
ancientTemple.preObstacle: The floor ahead looks unstable! Shout 'whee' to jump!

ancientTemple.name: sleeping jaguar
ancientTemple.preObstacle: A hungry jaguar! Keep it busy with a steak by shouting 'yum'!

ancientTemple.name: rats
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Careful! The floor is moving up ahead!
ancientTemple.headsUp: Careful! The floor is moving up ahead!

ancientTemple.name: crocodile
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Woah, a giant croc! Remember to shout 'yum' to give it a steak!
ancientTemple.headsUp: Watch out! Something big and leathery incoming!

ancientTemple.name: poison gas
ancientTemple.preObstacle: A stinky poison gas in the air! Don't forget to say 'yikes' to slide under!
ancientTemple.headsUp: What's that green cloud I see?

pirateBay.name: rocks ahead
pirateBay.preObstacle: Rocks ahead! Remember to say 'wowzer' to avoid them!
pirateBay.headsUp: Something big and sharp up ahead!

pirateBay.name: sailors
pirateBay.preObstacle: Sailors! Remember to let them know we're friendly by shouting 'ahoy!'
pirateBay.headsUp: I think I see people in front of us!

pirateBay.name: pirates
pirateBay.preObstacle: Evil pirates! Don't forget to give your crew the signal by shouting 'whammo'!
pirateBay.headsUp: Oh no! The Jolly Roger flag!

pirateBay.name: big wave
pirateBay.preObstacle: Woah, that's one big wave! Remember to say 'whee' to speed up!
pirateBay.headsUp: Uh oh, the ocean's getting crazier!

pirateBay.name: mermaids
pirateBay.preObstacle: I see mermaids! Don't forget, they'll attack if you don't say 'ahoy!'
pirateBay.headsUp: Are those fish ladies up ahead?

pirateBay.name: pirate queen
pirateBay.preObstacle: The dreaded pirate queen! Remember, you can defend with our cannons by saying 'whammo'!
pirateBay.headsUp: Yikes! We're about to face one mean lady!

pirateBay.name: sea snake
pirateBay.preObstacle: Oh no, an enormous sea snake! Don't forget to say 'kerpow' to use the giant harpoon!

pirateBay.name: barrel bomb
pirateBay.preObstacle: Remember to say 'wowzer' to avoid those barrel bombs coming our way!

pirateBay.name: whirlpool
pirateBay.preObstacle: We're approaching a whirlpool. Don't forget to say 'whee' to speed through it!

pirateBay.name: kraken
pirateBay.preObstacle: The Kraken is real! Remember to shout 'kerpow!' to shoot a giant harpoon at it!
pirateBay.headsUp: Heads up! Something big is coming up out of the water!

kingdomChase.name: wall
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief ran into a wall! Remember to say 'woo hoo' to woo hoo over it!
kingdomChase.headsUp: I see something ahead that we'll need to climb!

kingdomChase.name: moat
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Water coming up! Don't forget, you can swim across by saying 'splash'!

kingdomChase.name: rose bush
kingdomChase.preObstacle: A rose bush coming up! Remember to say 'whee' to not get poked!

kingdomChase.name: dragon
kingdomChase.preObstacle: No way, a dragon! Remember to shout 'uh oh' before it sees you!
kingdomChase.headsUp: Did anyone else hear a roar?

kingdomChase.name: tomato
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief has a tomato! Don't forget to say 'yikes' to duck under it!
kingdomChase.headsUp: Careful! The thief is digging into his bag!

kingdomChase.name: baby ducks
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Oh no, baby ducks up ahead! Remember to jump over by saying 'whee'!
kingdomChase.headsUp: Are those cute fluffy things up ahead?

kingdomChase.name: beehive
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief has a beehive! Duck under by saying 'yikes'!
kingdomChase.headsUp: I hear buzzing coming from the thief!

kingdomChase.name: pond
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Pond incoming! Remember to swim by shouting 'splash'!
kingdomChase.headsUp: The thief just dove into some water!

kingdomChase.name: troll
kingdomChase.preObstacle: I see a hungry troll! Remember to hide by saying 'uh oh'!
kingdomChase.headsUp: Woah, a dangerous creature up ahead!

kingdomChase.name: sleeping giant
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief ran into a wall! Don't forget to say 'woo hoo' to climb over it!
kingdomChase.headsUp: We're about to run into something huge!
